name: fp-naive
author: Alexey
description: Library for functional programming in JavaScript

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run all:build
scripts.declaration:build:savely: npm run declaration:delete; npm run declaration:build;
scripts.executable:build: npm run js:delete; npm run js:build; npm run declaration:build
scripts.all:build: npm run js:delete; npm run docs:delete; npm run js:build; npm run declaration:build; npm run docs:build
